titleStmt.title: Hymen's præludia, or, Loves master-piece being the sixth part of that so much admir'd romance intituled Cleopatra / written originally in French and now rendred into English by I.C.
Cléopatre. English Part 6
titleStmt.author: La Calprenède, Gaultier de Coste, seigneur de, d. 1663.
J. C. (John Coles), b. 1623 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Leach for R. Lowndes,

notesStmt.note: A translation of part 6 of La Calprenède's Cléopâtre. Loveday translated parts 1-3; the remainder were translated by John Coles, James Webb, & John Davies.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
